00087 /// Pause the game.
00088 void TCYC_MenuPause(const char *pauseTxt, GXColor *txtColor)
00089 {
00090   g_options->isPaused = true;
00091   MODPlay_Pause(&g_modPlay, 1); // pause music
00092 
00093   GuiText txt(pauseTxt, 38, txtColor ? *txtColor : (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00094   txt.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_MIDDLE);
00095   txt.SetPosition(0, 0);
00096 
00097   GuiWindow pauseWindow(screenwidth, screenheight);
00098   if (pauseTxt)
00099     pauseWindow.Append(&txt);
00100 
00101   // Quit Button
00102   GuiButton quitBtn(btnOutline->GetWidth(), btnOutline->GetHeight());
00103   GuiText quitBtnTxt("Quit", 28, (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255});
00104   GuiImage quitBtnImg(btnOutline);
00105   GuiImage quitBtnImgOver(btnOutlineOver);
00106 
00107   quitBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
00108   quitBtn.SetPosition(-50 - btnOutline->GetWidth(), -50);
00109   quitBtn.SetLabel(&quitBtnTxt);
00110   quitBtn.SetImage(&quitBtnImg);
00111   quitBtn.SetImageOver(&quitBtnImgOver);
00112   quitBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
00113   quitBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
00114   quitBtn.SetEffectGrow();
00115   pauseWindow.Append(&quitBtn);
00116 
00117   // Restart Button
00118   GuiButton restartBtn(btnOutline->GetWidth(), btnOutline->GetHeight());
00119   GuiText restartBtnTxt("Restart", 28, (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255});
00120   GuiImage restartBtnImg(btnOutline);
00121   GuiImage restartBtnImgOver(btnOutlineOver);
00122 
00123   restartBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
00124   restartBtn.SetPosition(-50, -50);
00125   restartBtn.SetLabel(&restartBtnTxt);
00126   restartBtn.SetImage(&restartBtnImg);
00127   restartBtn.SetImageOver(&restartBtnImgOver);
00128   restartBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
00129   restartBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
00130   restartBtn.SetEffectGrow();
00131   pauseWindow.Append(&restartBtn);
00132 
00133   // We can only pause from within the game, so the gui is already halted.
00134   mainWindow->Append(&pauseWindow);
00135 
00136   TCYC_SetUp2D();
00137 
00138   while (g_options->isPaused)
00139   {
00140     UpdatePads();
00141     TCYC_DrawText();
00142     mainWindow->Draw();
00143 
00144     for (int i = g_options->players - 1; i >= 0; --i) // so that player 1's cursor appears on top!
00145     {
00146       if (userInput[i].wpad->ir.valid)
00147       {
00148         Menu_DrawImg(userInput[i].wpad->ir.x - 48, userInput[i].wpad->ir.y - 48,
00149                      96, 96, pointer[i]->GetImage(), userInput[i].wpad->ir.angle, 
00150                      1, 1, 255);
00151       }
00152 
00153       DoRumble(i);
00154       mainWindow->Update(&userInput[i]);
00155     }
00156 
00157     Menu_Render();
00158 
00159     if (PausePressedAnyPlayer())
00160     {
00161       g_options->isPaused = false;
00162       MODPlay_Pause(&g_modPlay, 0); // unpause music
00163     }
00164     else if (quitBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00165     {
00166       g_options->isPaused = false;
00167       g_tcycMenu = TCYC_MENU_MAIN;
00168     }
00169     else if (restartBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00170     {
00171       g_options->isPaused = false;
00172       g_tcycMenu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00173     }
00174   }
00175 
00176   // Scan pads again or else pressing A will cause the piece to drop.
00177   UpdatePads();
00178 
00179   mainWindow->Remove(&pauseWindow);
00180 }
00181 
00182 /// Displays an error message and exits the program.
00183 /**
00184  * Example:
00185   @code
00186   if (g_totalPowerups > MAX_POWERUPS)
00187   {
00188     char errorBuf[60] = "In defines_Powerup.h you must set MAX_POWERUPS to ";
00189     sprintf(errorBuf + 50, "%d.", g_totalPowerups);
00190     TCYC_MenuError(errorBuf);
00191   }
00192   @endcode
00193  */
00194 void TCYC_MenuError(const char *errorTxt)
00195 {
00196   WindowPrompt("ERROR", errorTxt, "exit");
00197   exit(1);
00198 }
00199 
00200 /// Load all the menu resources.
00201 void TCYC_MenuLoadResources()
00202 {
00203   trigA    = new GuiTrigger();
00204   trigA->SetSimpleTrigger(-1, WPAD_BUTTON_A | WPAD_CLASSIC_BUTTON_A, PAD_BUTTON_A);
00205   trigHome = new GuiTrigger();
00206   trigHome->SetButtonOnlyTrigger(-1, WPAD_BUTTON_HOME | WPAD_CLASSIC_BUTTON_HOME, 0);
00207 
00208   btnSoundOver = new GuiSound(button_over_pcm, button_over_pcm_size, SOUND_PCM);
00209   g_heartbeatSound = new GuiSound(heartbeat_pcm, heartbeat_pcm_size, SOUND_PCM);
00210   g_tetrisCheerSound = new GuiSound(tetris_cheer_pcm, tetris_cheer_pcm_size, SOUND_PCM);
00211   
00212   btnOutline             = new GuiImageData(button_png);
00213   btnOutlineOver         = new GuiImageData(button_over_png);
00214   btnLargeOutline        = new GuiImageData(button_large_png);
00215   btnLargeOutlineOver    = new GuiImageData(button_large_over_png);
00216   btnData40x40Square     = new GuiImageData(keyboard_key_png);
00217   btnData40x40SquareOver = new GuiImageData(keyboard_key_over_png);
00218   btnData80x40           = new GuiImageData(keyboard_mediumkey_png);
00219   btnData80x40Over       = new GuiImageData(keyboard_mediumkey_over_png);
00220   btnDataMinus           = new GuiImageData(scrollbar_arrowdown_png);
00221   btnDataMinusOver       = new GuiImageData(scrollbar_arrowdown_over_png);
00222   btnDataPlus            = new GuiImageData(scrollbar_arrowup_png);
00223   btnDataPlusOver        = new GuiImageData(scrollbar_arrowup_over_png);
00224   tetrisLove             = new GuiImageData(tetris_love_png);
00225   grabber[0]             = new GuiImageData(player1_grab_png);
00226   grabber[1]             = new GuiImageData(player2_grab_png);
00227   grabber[2]             = new GuiImageData(player3_grab_png);
00228   grabber[3]             = new GuiImageData(player4_grab_png);
00229   debug_grabber1         = new GuiImageData(player1_grab_png);
00230   debug_grabber2         = new GuiImageData(player2_grab_png);
00231   debug_grabber3         = new GuiImageData(player3_grab_png);
00232   debug_grabber4         = new GuiImageData(player4_grab_png);
00233 
00234   // Init the main screen background image and music.
00235   bgImg   = new GuiImage(tetrisLove);
00236   bgMusic = new GuiSound(tetricycle_by_dj_dimz_ogg, tetricycle_by_dj_dimz_ogg_size, SOUND_OGG);
00237   bgMusic->SetVolume(50);
00238   bgMusic->SetLoop(true);
00239 }

00241 /// Displays the startup screen.
00242 void TCYC_MenuStartup()
00243 { 
00244   GuiText titleTxt("TetriCycle 1.0, by calvinss4", 28, (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00245   titleTxt.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
00246   titleTxt.SetPosition(0, 50);
00247 
00248   GuiText wwwTxt("www.wiibrew.org/wiki/TetriCycle", 28, (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00249   wwwTxt.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
00250   wwwTxt.SetPosition(0, 100);
00251 
00252   GuiText emailTxt1("Questions or comments:", 28, (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00253   emailTxt1.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
00254   emailTxt1.SetPosition(0, 150);
00255 
00256   GuiText emailTxt2("TetriCycle[at]gmail.com", 28, (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00257   emailTxt2.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
00258   emailTxt2.SetPosition(0, 190);
00259 
00260   GuiText scamTxt("If you paid for this you were scammed!", 26, (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00261   scamTxt.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
00262   scamTxt.SetPosition(0, 250);
00263 
00264   GuiText initTxt("PRESS ANY BUTTON", 30, (GXColor){255, 255, 255, 255});
00265   initTxt.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
00266   initTxt.SetPosition(0, 300);
00267 
00268   GuiWindow w(screenwidth, screenheight);
00269   w.Append(&titleTxt);
00270   w.Append(&wwwTxt);
00271   w.Append(&emailTxt1);
00272   w.Append(&emailTxt2);
00273   w.Append(&scamTxt);
00274   w.Append(&initTxt);
00275   
00276   HaltGui();
00277   mainWindow->Append(&w);
00278   ResumeGui();
00279 
00280   // Load resources while the startup screen is displaying.
00281   TCYC_MenuLoadResources();
00282 
00283   bool loop = true;
00284   while (loop)
00285   {
00286     for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYERS; ++i)
00287     {
00288       if (WPAD_ButtonsDown(i))
00289       {
00290         loop = false;
00291         break;
00292       }
00293     }
00294   }
00295 
00296   HaltGui();
00297   mainWindow->Remove(&w);
00298 }
00299 
00300 /// The game state loop.
00301 void TCYC_MenuLoop()
00302 {
00303   // Display the startup screen.
00304   TCYC_MenuStartup();
00305 
00306   g_tcycMenu = TCYC_MENU_MAIN;
00307 
00308   while (g_tcycMenu != TCYC_MENU_EXIT)
00309   {
00310     switch (g_tcycMenu)
00311     {
00312       case TCYC_MENU_MAIN:
00313         g_tcycMenu = TCYC_MenuMainScreen(); // halts the gui before exiting
00314         break;
00315       case TCYC_MENU_GAME:
00316         g_tcycMenu = TCYC_MenuGame();
00317         break;
00318       default: // unrecognized menu
00319         g_tcycMenu = TCYC_MENU_EXIT;
00320         break;
00321     }
00322   }
00323 }
00324

00516   GuiText edit3PBtnTxt("3P", 22, (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255});
00517   GuiImage edit3PBtnImg(btnData40x40Square);
00518   GuiImage edit3PBtnImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
00519 
00520   edit3PBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_LEFT, ALIGN_TOP);
00521   edit3PBtn.SetPosition(50 + 2 * btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), 290);
00522   edit3PBtn.SetLabel(&edit3PBtnTxt);
00523   edit3PBtn.SetImage(&edit3PBtnImg);
00524   edit3PBtn.SetImageOver(&edit3PBtnImgOver);
00525   edit3PBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
00526   edit3PBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
00527   edit3PBtn.SetEffectGrow();
00528 
00529   GuiButton edit4PBtn(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
00530   GuiText edit4PBtnTxt("4P", 22, (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255});
00531   GuiImage edit4PBtnImg(btnData40x40Square);
00532   GuiImage edit4PBtnImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
00533 
00534   edit4PBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_LEFT, ALIGN_TOP);
00535   edit4PBtn.SetPosition(50 + 3 * btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), 290);
00536   edit4PBtn.SetLabel(&edit4PBtnTxt);
00537   edit4PBtn.SetImage(&edit4PBtnImg);
00538   edit4PBtn.SetImageOver(&edit4PBtnImgOver);
00539   edit4PBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
00540   edit4PBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
00541   edit4PBtn.SetEffectGrow();
00542 
00543   //--- Populate the window ---
00544   GuiWindow w(screenwidth, screenheight);
00545   w.Append(bgImg);
00546   w.Append(&titleTxt);
00547   w.Append(&p1Btn);
00548   w.Append(&p2Btn);
00549   w.Append(&p3Btn);
00550   w.Append(&p4Btn);
00551   w.Append(&profileBtn);
00552   w.Append(&mpOptionsBtn);
00553   w.Append(&mpHandicapsBtn);
00554   w.Append(&returnBtn);
00555   w.Append(&exitBtn);
00556   w.Append(&heartBtn);
00557   w.Append(&playfieldTxt);
00558   w.Append(&edit1PBtn);
00559   w.Append(&edit2PBtn);
00560   w.Append(&edit3PBtn);
00561   w.Append(&edit4PBtn);
00562   //w.Append(&networkBtn);
00563 
00564   HaltGui();
00565   mainWindow->Append(&w);
00566   ResumeGui();
00567 
00568   int menu = TCYC_MENU_NONE;
00569 
00570   while (menu == TCYC_MENU_NONE)
00571   {
00572     usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
00573     if (p1Btn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00574     {
00575       g_options->players = 1;
00576       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00577     }
00578     else if (p2Btn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00579     {
00580       g_options->players = 2;
00581       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00582     }
00583     else if (p3Btn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00584     {
00585       g_options->players = 3;
00586       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00587     }
00588     else if (p4Btn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00589     {
00590       g_options->players = 4;
00591       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00592     }
00593     else if (profileBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00594     {
00595       profileBtn.ResetState();
00596       TCYC_MenuPlayerProfilesPopup();
00597     }
00598     else if (mpOptionsBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00599     {
00600       mpOptionsBtn.ResetState();
00601       TCYC_MenuMpOptionsPopup();
00602     }
00603     else if (mpHandicapsBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00604     {
00605       mpHandicapsBtn.ResetState();
00606       TCYC_MenuMpOptionsPopup(false/*isGlobalOptions*/);
00607     }
00608     else if (returnBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00609     {
00610       exit(0);
00611     }
00612     else if (exitBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00613     {
00614       SYS_ResetSystem(SYS_RETURNTOMENU, 0, 0);
00615     }
00616     else if (heartBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00617     {
00618       heartBtn.ResetState();
00619       _DoEasterEgg();
00620     }
00621     else if (edit1PBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00622     {
00623       g_options->players = 1;
00624       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00625       g_isEditMode = true;
00626     }
00627     else if (edit2PBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00628     {
00629       g_options->players = 2;
00630       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00631       g_isEditMode = true;
00632     }
00633     else if (edit3PBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00634     {
00635       g_options->players = 3;
00636       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00637       g_isEditMode = true;
00638     }
00639     else if (edit4PBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
00640     {
00641       g_options->players = 4;
00642       menu = TCYC_MENU_GAME;
00643       g_isEditMode = true;
00644     }
00645   }
00646 
00647   if (!g_isEditMode)
00648     bgMusic->Stop();
00649 
00650   HaltGui();
00651   mainWindow->Remove(&w);
00652   return menu;
00653 }
00654 
00655 /// Runs the game loop.
00656 int TCYC_MenuGame()
00657 {
00658   // Doing this in a loop allows us to reset the game.
00659   while (g_tcycMenu == TCYC_MENU_GAME)
00660   {
00661     if (g_isEditMode)
00662       TCYC_EditPlayfield();
00663     else
00664       TCYC_Game();
00665   }
00666 
00667   return TCYC_MENU_MAIN;
00668 }
00669

01005 
01006   promptWindow.Append(&rotationTxtBtn);
01007   promptWindow.Append(&rotationLeftArrowBtn);
01008   promptWindow.Append(&rotationRightArrowBtn);
01009   promptWindow.Append(&rotationTxt);
01010 
01011   promptWindow.Append(&shakeTxtBtn);
01012   promptWindow.Append(&shakeLeftArrowBtn);
01013   promptWindow.Append(&shakeRightArrowBtn);
01014   promptWindow.Append(&shakeTxt);
01015 
01016   promptWindow.Append(&shadowTxtBtn);
01017   promptWindow.Append(&shadowLeftArrowBtn);
01018   promptWindow.Append(&shadowRightArrowBtn);
01019   promptWindow.Append(&shadowTxt);
01020 
01021   promptWindow.Append(&previewTxtBtn);
01022   promptWindow.Append(&previewLeftArrowBtn);
01023   promptWindow.Append(&previewRightArrowBtn);
01024   promptWindow.Append(&previewTxt);
01025 
01026   promptWindow.Append(&confirmBtn);
01027   promptWindow.Append(&cancelBtn);
01028   promptWindow.Append(&helpBtn);
01029 
01030   promptWindow.SetEffect(EFFECT_SLIDE_TOP | EFFECT_SLIDE_IN, 50);
01031   HaltGui();
01032   // This sets the state for all child elements, including child windows; 
01033   // that is why we disable the state first, then add the child window.
01034   mainWindow->SetState(STATE_DISABLED);
01035   mainWindow->Append(&promptWindow);
01036   mainWindow->ChangeFocus(&promptWindow);
01037   ResumeGui();
01038 
01039   while (true)
01040   {
01041     usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
01042 
01043     if (confirmBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01044     {
01045       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYERS; ++i)
01046       {
01047         g_players[i].isNormalRotation = isNormalRotation[i];
01048         g_players[i].isShakeEnabled   = isShakeEnabled[i];
01049         g_players[i].isShadowEnabled  = isShadowEnabled[i];
01050         g_players[i].isPreviewEnabled = isPreviewEnabled[i];
01051       }
01052 
01053       break;
01054     }
01055     else if (cancelBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01056     {
01057       break;
01058     }
01059     else if (helpBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01060     {
01061       helpBtn.ResetState();
01062 
01063       WindowPrompt(
01064         "HINT",
01065         "The option menu labels are clickable. Click on them for more information!",
01066         "OK",
01067         NULL,
01068         &promptWindow);
01069     }
01070     // player buttons
01071     else if (playerLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01072     {
01073       HaltGui();
01074       playerLeftArrowBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
01075       player--;
01076       if (player < 0)
01077         player = MAX_PLAYERS - 1;
01078 
01079       sprintf(playerBuf + 7, "%d", player + 1);
01080       playerTxt.SetText(playerBuf);
01081       rotationTxt.SetText(isNormalRotation[player] ? "normal" : "reverse");
01082       shakeTxt.SetText(isShakeEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01083       shadowTxt.SetText(isShadowEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01084       previewTxt.SetText(isPreviewEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01085       ResumeGui();
01086     }
01087     else if (playerRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01088     {
01089       HaltGui();
01090       playerRightArrowBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
01091       player++;
01092       if (player >= MAX_PLAYERS)
01093         player = 0;
01094 
01095       sprintf(playerBuf + 7, "%d", player + 1);
01096       playerTxt.SetText(playerBuf);
01097       rotationTxt.SetText(isNormalRotation[player] ? "normal" : "reverse");
01098       shakeTxt.SetText(isShakeEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01099       shadowTxt.SetText(isShadowEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01100       previewTxt.SetText(isPreviewEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01101       ResumeGui();
01102     }
01103     // rotation
01104     else if (rotationTxtBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01105     {
01106       rotationTxtBtn.ResetState();
01107 
01108       WindowPrompt(
01109         "ROTATION",
01110         "The direction in which the tetris cylinder rotates. "
01111         "Set it to reverse if you're too used to regular tetris.",
01112         "OK",
01113         NULL,
01114         &promptWindow);
01115     }
01116     else if (rotationLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED 
01117       || rotationRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01118     {
01119       HaltGui();
01120       rotationLeftArrowBtn.ResetState();
01121       rotationRightArrowBtn.ResetState();
01122       isNormalRotation[player] = !isNormalRotation[player];
01123       rotationTxt.SetText(isNormalRotation[player] ? "normal" : "reverse");
01124       ResumeGui();
01125     }
01126     // shake
01127     else if (shakeTxtBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01128     {
01129       shakeTxtBtn.ResetState();
01130 
01131       WindowPrompt(
01132         "SHAKE",
01133         "Allows tetris pieces to be dropped by performing a vertical shake "
01134         "motion with the wiimote.",
01135         "OK",
01136         NULL,
01137         &promptWindow);
01138     }
01139     else if (shakeLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED 
01140       || shakeRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01141     {
01142       HaltGui();
01143       shakeLeftArrowBtn.ResetState();
01144       shakeRightArrowBtn.ResetState();
01145       isShakeEnabled[player] = !isShakeEnabled[player];
01146       shakeTxt.SetText(isShakeEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01147       ResumeGui();
01148     }
01149     // shadow
01150     else if (shadowTxtBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01151     {
01152       shadowTxtBtn.ResetState();
01153 
01154       WindowPrompt(
01155         "SHADOW",
01156         "Shows where the current piece will drop.",
01157         "OK",
01158         NULL,
01159         &promptWindow);
01160     }
01161     else if (shadowLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED 
01162       || shadowRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01163     {
01164       HaltGui();
01165       shadowLeftArrowBtn.ResetState();
01166       shadowRightArrowBtn.ResetState();
01167       isShadowEnabled[player] = !isShadowEnabled[player];
01168       shadowTxt.SetText(isShadowEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01169       ResumeGui();
01170     }
01171     // preview
01172     else if (previewTxtBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01173     {
01174       previewTxtBtn.ResetState();
01175 
01176       WindowPrompt(
01177         "PREVIEW",
01178         "Shows the next piece.",
01179         "OK",
01180         NULL,
01181         &promptWindow);
01182     }
01183     else if (previewLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED 
01184       || previewRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01185     {
01186       HaltGui();
01187       previewLeftArrowBtn.ResetState();
01188       previewRightArrowBtn.ResetState();
01189       isPreviewEnabled[player] = !isPreviewEnabled[player];
01190       previewTxt.SetText(isPreviewEnabled[player] ? "on" : "off");
01191       ResumeGui();
01192     }
01193   }
01194 
01195   promptWindow.SetEffect(EFFECT_SLIDE_TOP | EFFECT_SLIDE_OUT, 50);
01196   while(promptWindow.GetEffect() > 0) usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
01197   HaltGui();
01198   mainWindow->Remove(&promptWindow);
01199   mainWindow->SetState(STATE_DEFAULT);
01200   ResumeGui();
01201 }
01202 
01203 /// Launches the powerups popup.
01204 void TCYC_MenuPowerupsPopup(GuiWindow *parentWindow, 
01205                             vector<bool> &isPowerupEnabled,
01206                             PowerupId powerupStartQueue[MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS])
01207 {
01208   GXColor helpTxtColor = (GXColor){0, 170, 0, 255};
01209   GXColor blackColor = (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255};
01210 
01211   vector<bool> tmpIsPowerupEnabled(isPowerupEnabled);
01212 
01213   PowerupId tmpPowerupStartQueue[MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS];
01214   memcpy(tmpPowerupStartQueue, powerupStartQueue, sizeof(tmpPowerupStartQueue));
01215 
01216   // popup window
01217   GuiWindow window(screenwidth - 100, screenheight - 100);
01218   window.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_MIDDLE);
01219   window.SetPosition(0, 0);
01220   window.SetEffect(EFFECT_SLIDE_TOP | EFFECT_SLIDE_IN, 50);
01221 
01222   // background image
01223   GuiImage bgImg(screenwidth - 100, screenheight - 100, (GXColor){150, 150, 150, 255});
01224 
01225   // title text
01226   GuiText titleTxt("Powerups", 30, blackColor);
01227   titleTxt.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_TOP);
01228   titleTxt.SetPosition(0, 15);
01229 
01230   // CONFIRM BUTTON
01231   GuiButton confirmBtn(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01232   GuiText confirmBtnTxt("OK", 22, (GXColor){0, 0, 255, 255});
01233   GuiImage confirmBtnImg(btnData40x40Square);
01234   GuiImage confirmBtnImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01235 
01236   confirmBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
01237   confirmBtn.SetPosition(-10, -10);
01238   confirmBtn.SetLabel(&confirmBtnTxt);
01239   confirmBtn.SetImage(&confirmBtnImg);
01240   confirmBtn.SetImageOver(&confirmBtnImgOver);
01241   confirmBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01242   confirmBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01243   confirmBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01244 
01245   // CANCEL BUTTON
01246   GuiButton cancelBtn(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01247   GuiText cancelBtnTxt("X", 22, (GXColor){255, 0, 0, 255});
01248   GuiImage cancelBtnImg(btnData40x40Square);
01249   GuiImage cancelBtnImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01250 
01251   cancelBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_TOP);
01252   cancelBtn.SetPosition(-10, 10);
01253   cancelBtn.SetLabel(&cancelBtnTxt);
01254   cancelBtn.SetImage(&cancelBtnImg);
01255   cancelBtn.SetImageOver(&cancelBtnImgOver);
01256   cancelBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01257   cancelBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01258   cancelBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01259 
01260   // HELP BUTTON
01261   GuiButton helpBtn(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01262   GuiText helpBtnTxt("?", 22, helpTxtColor);
01263   GuiImage helpBtnImg(btnData40x40Square);
01264   GuiImage helpBtnImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01265 
01266   helpBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_LEFT, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
01267   helpBtn.SetPosition(10, -10);
01268   helpBtn.SetLabel(&helpBtnTxt);
01269   helpBtn.SetImage(&helpBtnImg);
01270   helpBtn.SetImageOver(&helpBtnImgOver);
01271   helpBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01272   helpBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01273   helpBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01274 
01275   // ALL ON BUTTON
01276   GuiButton allOnBtn(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01277   GuiText allOnTxt("on", 22, blackColor);
01278   GuiImage allOnImg(btnData40x40Square);
01279   GuiImage allOnImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01280 
01281   allOnBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
01282   allOnBtn.SetPosition(-btnData40x40Square->GetWidth() / 2, -10);
01283   allOnBtn.SetLabel(&allOnTxt);
01284   allOnBtn.SetImage(&allOnImg);
01285   allOnBtn.SetImageOver(&allOnImgOver);
01286   allOnBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01287   allOnBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01288   allOnBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01289 
01290   // ALL OFF BUTTON
01291   GuiButton allOffBtn(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01292   GuiText allOffTxt("off", 22, blackColor);
01293   GuiImage allOffImg(btnData40x40Square);
01294   GuiImage allOffImgOver(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01295 
01296   allOffBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_CENTRE, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
01297   allOffBtn.SetPosition(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth() / 2, -10);
01298   allOffBtn.SetLabel(&allOffTxt);
01299   allOffBtn.SetImage(&allOffImg);
01300   allOffBtn.SetImageOver(&allOffImgOver);
01301   allOffBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01302   allOffBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01303   allOffBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01304 
01305   // SCROLL UP BUTTON
01306   GuiButton scrollUpBtn(btnDataPlus->GetWidth(), btnDataPlus->GetHeight());
01307   GuiImage scrollUpImg(btnDataPlus);
01308   GuiImage scrollUpImgOver(btnDataPlusOver);
01309 
01310   scrollUpBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_MIDDLE);
01311   scrollUpBtn.SetPosition(-10, -btnDataPlus->GetHeight() / 2);
01312   scrollUpBtn.SetImage(&scrollUpImg);
01313   scrollUpBtn.SetImageOver(&scrollUpImgOver);
01314   scrollUpBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01315   scrollUpBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01316   scrollUpBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01317 
01318   // SCROLL DOWN BUTTON
01319   GuiButton scrollDownBtn(btnDataMinus->GetWidth(), btnDataMinus->GetHeight());
01320   GuiImage scrollDownImg(btnDataMinus);
01321   GuiImage scrollDownImgOver(btnDataMinusOver);
01322 
01323   scrollDownBtn.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_MIDDLE);
01324   scrollDownBtn.SetPosition(-10, btnDataMinus->GetHeight() / 2);
01325   scrollDownBtn.SetImage(&scrollDownImg);
01326   scrollDownBtn.SetImageOver(&scrollDownImgOver);
01327   scrollDownBtn.SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01328   scrollDownBtn.SetTrigger(trigA);
01329   scrollDownBtn.SetEffectGrow();
01330 
01331   // add buttons to window
01332   window.Append(&bgImg);
01333   window.Append(&titleTxt);
01334   window.Append(&confirmBtn);
01335   window.Append(&cancelBtn);
01336   window.Append(&helpBtn);
01337   window.Append(&allOnBtn);
01338   window.Append(&allOffBtn);
01339   window.Append(&scrollUpBtn);
01340   window.Append(&scrollDownBtn);
01341 
01342   // POWERUP BUTTONS
01343   int top = 60;
01344 
01345   vector<GuiButton> powerupIconBtns(g_totalPowerups);
01346   vector<GuiImage> powerupIconImgs(g_totalPowerups);
01347 
01348   vector<GuiButton> powerupOnBtns(g_totalPowerups);
01349   vector<GuiText> powerupOnTxts(g_totalPowerups);
01350   vector<GuiImage> powerupOnImgs(g_totalPowerups);
01351   vector<GuiImage> powerupOnImgsOver(g_totalPowerups);
01352 
01353   vector<GuiButton> powerupHelpBtns(g_totalPowerups);
01354   vector<GuiText> powerupHelpTxts(g_totalPowerups);
01355   vector<GuiImage> powerupHelpImgs(g_totalPowerups);
01356   vector<GuiImage> powerupHelpImgsOver(g_totalPowerups);
01357 
01358   for (int i = 0; i < g_totalPowerups; ++i)
01359   {
01360     // powerup icon buttons
01361     powerupIconImgs[i].SetImage(PowerupUtils::GetImageData((PowerupId)i));
01362     powerupIconImgs[i].SetDisplaySize(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01363 
01364     powerupIconBtns[i].SetSize(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01365     powerupIconBtns[i].SetAlignment(ALIGN_LEFT, ALIGN_TOP);
01366     powerupIconBtns[i].SetPosition(20, top + i * btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01367     powerupIconBtns[i].SetImage(&powerupIconImgs[i]);
01368     powerupIconBtns[i].SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01369     powerupIconBtns[i].SetTrigger(trigA);
01370     powerupIconBtns[i].SetEffectGrow();
01371 
01372     // powerup on/off buttons
01373     powerupOnTxts[i].SetText(tmpIsPowerupEnabled[i] ? "on" : "off");
01374     powerupOnTxts[i].SetFontSize(22);
01375     powerupOnTxts[i].SetColor(blackColor);
01376     powerupOnImgs[i].SetImage(btnData40x40Square);
01377     powerupOnImgsOver[i].SetImage(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01378 
01379     powerupOnBtns[i].SetSize(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01380     powerupOnBtns[i].SetAlignment(ALIGN_LEFT, ALIGN_TOP);
01381     powerupOnBtns[i].SetPosition(20 + btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), top + i * btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01382     powerupOnBtns[i].SetLabel(&powerupOnTxts[i]);
01383     powerupOnBtns[i].SetImage(&powerupOnImgs[i]);
01384     powerupOnBtns[i].SetImageOver(&powerupOnImgsOver[i]);
01385     powerupOnBtns[i].SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01386     powerupOnBtns[i].SetTrigger(trigA);
01387     powerupOnBtns[i].SetEffectGrow();
01388 
01389     // powerup help buttons
01390     powerupHelpTxts[i].SetText("?");
01391     powerupHelpTxts[i].SetFontSize(22);
01392     powerupHelpTxts[i].SetColor(helpTxtColor);
01393     powerupHelpImgs[i].SetImage(btnData40x40Square);
01394     powerupHelpImgsOver[i].SetImage(btnData40x40SquareOver);
01395 
01396     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetSize(btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01397     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetAlignment(ALIGN_LEFT, ALIGN_TOP);
01398     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetPosition(20 + 2 * btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), top + i * btnData40x40Square->GetHeight());
01399     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetLabel(&powerupHelpTxts[i]);
01400     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetImage(&powerupHelpImgs[i]);
01401     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetImageOver(&powerupHelpImgsOver[i]);
01402     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01403     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetTrigger(trigA);
01404     powerupHelpBtns[i].SetEffectGrow();
01405 
01406     window.Append(&powerupIconBtns[i]);
01407     window.Append(&powerupOnBtns[i]);
01408     window.Append(&powerupHelpBtns[i]);
01409   }
01410 
01411   // POWERUP QUEUE BUTTONS
01412   GuiButton powerupQueueBtns[MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS];
01413   GuiImage powerupQueueImgs[MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS];
01414 
01415   int y = 0;
01416   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS; ++i, y += POWERUP_WIDTH)
01417   {
01418     powerupQueueImgs[i].SetImage(tmpPowerupStartQueue[i] == POWERUP_ID_NONE ? 
01419       btnData40x40Square : PowerupUtils::GetImageData(tmpPowerupStartQueue[i]));
01420     powerupQueueImgs[i].SetDisplaySize(POWERUP_WIDTH, POWERUP_WIDTH);
01421 
01422     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetSize(POWERUP_WIDTH, POWERUP_WIDTH);
01423     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_TOP);
01424     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetPosition(-60, 60 + y);
01425     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetImage(powerupQueueImgs + i);
01426     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetSoundOver(btnSoundOver);
01427     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetTrigger(trigA);
01428     powerupQueueBtns[i].SetEffectGrow();
01429 
01430     window.Append(powerupQueueBtns + i);
01431   }
01432 
01433   HaltGui();
01434   // This sets the state for all child elements, including child windows; 
01435   // that is why we disable the state first, then add the child window.
01436   parentWindow->DisableChildren();
01437   parentWindow->Append(&window);
01438   ResumeGui();
01439 
01440   while (true)
01441   {
01442     usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
01443 
01444     if (confirmBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01445     {
01446       isPowerupEnabled = tmpIsPowerupEnabled;
01447       memcpy(powerupStartQueue, tmpPowerupStartQueue, sizeof(tmpPowerupStartQueue));
01448       break;
01449     }
01450     else if (cancelBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01451     {
01452       break;
01453     }
01454     else if (helpBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01455     {
01456       helpBtn.ResetState();
01457 
01458       WindowPrompt(
01459         "HINT",
01460         "Click powerup icon to add it to initial powerup queue. Click "
01461         "icon in queue to remove it. Powerups only appear in "
01462         "game if turned on.",
01463         "OK",
01464         NULL,
01465         &window);
01466     }
01467     else if (allOnBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
01468              || allOffBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01469     {
01470       bool enabled = (allOnBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED);
01471       allOnBtn.ResetState();
01472       allOffBtn.ResetState();
01473       for (int i = 0; i < g_totalPowerups; ++i)
01474       {
01475         tmpIsPowerupEnabled[i] = enabled;
01476         powerupOnTxts[i].SetText(enabled ? "on" : "off");
01477       }
01478     }
01479     else if (scrollUpBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
01480              || scrollDownBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01481     {
01482       bool scrollUp = (scrollUpBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED);
01483       scrollUpBtn.ResetState();
01484       scrollDownBtn.ResetState();
01485       if (scrollUp)
01486       {
01487         top += 2 * 40; // scroll 2 powerups at a time
01488         if (top > 60)
01489           top = 60;
01490       }
01491       else
01492       {
01493         top -= 2 * 40; // scroll 2 powerups at a time
01494         int min = 60 - (g_totalPowerups - 2) * 40;
01495         if (top < min)
01496           top = min; // always show at least 2 powerups
01497       }
01498       for (int i = 0; i < g_totalPowerups; ++i)
01499       {
01500         int ypos = top + i * btnData40x40Square->GetHeight();
01501         powerupIconBtns[i].SetPosition(20, ypos);
01502         powerupOnBtns[i].SetPosition(20 + btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), ypos);
01503         powerupHelpBtns[i].SetPosition(20 + 2 * btnData40x40Square->GetWidth(), ypos);
01504 
01505         int state = STATE_DEFAULT;
01506         bool visible = true;
01507 
01508         // only show 6 powerups at a time
01509         if (ypos < 60 || ypos > 60 + 5 * 40)
01510         {
01511           state = STATE_DISABLED;
01512           visible = false;
01513         }
01514 
01515         powerupIconBtns[i].SetState(state);
01516         powerupIconBtns[i].SetVisible(visible);
01517         powerupOnBtns[i].SetState(state);
01518         powerupOnBtns[i].SetVisible(visible);
01519         powerupHelpBtns[i].SetState(state);
01520         powerupHelpBtns[i].SetVisible(visible);
01521       }
01522     }
01523 
01524     for (int i = 0; i < g_totalPowerups; ++i)
01525     {
01526       if (powerupIconBtns[i].GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01527       {
01528         powerupIconBtns[i].ResetState();
01529         // Add powerup to queue.
01530         for (int j = 0; j < MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS; ++j)
01531         {
01532           if (tmpPowerupStartQueue[j] == POWERUP_ID_NONE)
01533           {
01534             PowerupUtils::GetSound((PowerupId)i)->Play();
01535             tmpPowerupStartQueue[j] = (PowerupId)i;
01536             powerupQueueImgs[j].SetImage(PowerupUtils::GetImageData((PowerupId)i));
01537             break;
01538           }
01539         }
01540         break;
01541       }
01542       else if (powerupOnBtns[i].GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01543       {
01544         powerupOnBtns[i].ResetState();
01545         tmpIsPowerupEnabled[i] = !tmpIsPowerupEnabled[i];
01546         powerupOnTxts[i].SetText(tmpIsPowerupEnabled[i] ? "on" : "off");
01547         break;
01548       }
01549       else if (powerupHelpBtns[i].GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01550       {
01551         powerupHelpBtns[i].ResetState();
01552         std::string *helpText = PowerupUtils::GetHelpText((PowerupId)i);
01553         WindowPrompt(
01554           helpText[0].c_str(), // title
01555           helpText[1].c_str(), // message
01556           "OK",
01557           NULL,
01558           &window);
01559         break;
01560       }
01561     }
01562 
01563     for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ACQUIRED_POWERUPS; ++i)
01564     {
01565       if (powerupQueueBtns[i].GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
01566       {
01567         powerupQueueBtns[i].ResetState();
01568         // Remove powerup from queue.
01569         PowerupUtils::GetInvalidTargetSound()->Play();
01570         tmpPowerupStartQueue[i] = POWERUP_ID_NONE;
01571         powerupQueueImgs[i].SetImage(btnData40x40Square);
01572         break;
01573       }
01574     }
01575   }
01576 
01577   window.SetEffect(EFFECT_SLIDE_TOP | EFFECT_SLIDE_OUT, 50);
01578   while (window.GetEffect() > 0) usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
01579   HaltGui();
01580   parentWindow->Remove(&window);
01581   parentWindow->SetState(STATE_DEFAULT);
01582   ResumeGui();
01583 }
01584 
01585 /// Launches the multiplayer options popup.
01586 void TCYC_MenuMpOptionsPopup(bool isGlobalOptions)
01587 {
01588   static const int PADDING_TOP = 8;
01589   GXColor helpTxtColor = (GXColor){0, 170, 0, 255};
01590   GXColor blackColor = (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255};
01591 
01592   int player = 0;
01593   char playerBuf[7+1+1] = "PLAYER "; // values: 1-MAX_PLAYERS + "PLAYER "
01594   sprintf(playerBuf + 7, "%d", player + 1);
01595 
01596   bool isHandicapEnabled[MAX_PLAYERS];
01597   Profile profiles[MAX_PLAYERS];
01598 
01599   if (isGlobalOptions)
01600   {
01601     // Store the global options at index 0.
01602     isHandicapEnabled[player] = true; // Global options are always enabled.
01603     profiles[player] = g_options->profile;
01604   }
01605   else
01606   {
01607     // Initialize the handicap options.
01608     for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYERS; ++i)
01609     {
01610       isHandicapEnabled[i] = g_players[i].isHandicapEnabled;
01611       profiles[i] = g_players[i].profile;
01612     }
01613   }
01614 
01615   char maxLinesBuf[3+1]; // values: 0-995
01616   sprintf(maxLinesBuf, "%d", profiles[player].maxLines);
01617   char defMaxLinesBuf[3+1];
01618   sprintf(defMaxLinesBuf, "%d", DEFAULT_MAX_PLAYLINES);
01619 
01620   char attackRateBuf[2+1]; // values: 0-99
01621   sprintf(attackRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].attackRate);
01622   char defAttackRateBuf[2+1];
01623   sprintf(defAttackRateBuf, "%d", DEFAULT_ATTACK_RATE);
01624 
01625   char powerupRateBuf[2+1]; // values: 0-99

02000   promptWindow.Append(&linesTxtBtn);
02001   promptWindow.Append(&linesTxt);
02002   promptWindow.Append(&linesDefaultBtn);
02003   promptWindow.Append(&linesMinusBtn);

02016   promptWindow.Append(&cancelBtn);

02019 
02020   promptWindow.SetEffect(EFFECT_SLIDE_TOP | EFFECT_SLIDE_IN, 50);
02021   HaltGui();
02022   // This sets the state for all child elements, including child windows; 
02023   // that is why we disable the state first, then add the child window.
02024   mainWindow->SetState(STATE_DISABLED);
02025   mainWindow->Append(&promptWindow);
02026   mainWindow->ChangeFocus(&promptWindow);
02027   ResumeGui();
02028 
02029   while (true)
02030   {
02031     usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
02032 
02033     if (confirmBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02034     {
02035       if (isGlobalOptions)
02036       {
02037         g_options->profile = profiles[player];
02038         g_options->powerupsSize = 0;
02039         for (int j = 0; j < g_totalPowerups; ++j)
02040         {
02041           if (profiles[player].isPowerupEnabled[j])
02042             g_options->powerups[g_options->powerupsSize++] = (PowerupId)j;
02043         }
02044       }
02045       else // handicap options
02046       {
02047         for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYERS; ++i)
02048         {
02049           g_players[i].isHandicapEnabled = isHandicapEnabled[i];
02050           g_players[i].profile = profiles[i];
02051           g_players[i].powerupsSize = 0;
02052           for (int j = 0; j < g_totalPowerups; ++j)
02053           {
02054             if (profiles[i].isPowerupEnabled[j])
02055               g_players[i].powerups[g_players[i].powerupsSize++] = (PowerupId)j;
02056           }
02057         }
02058       }
02059 
02060       break;
02061     }
02062     else if (cancelBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02063     {
02064       break;
02065     }
02066     else if (helpBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02067     {
02068       helpBtn.ResetState();
02069 
02070       WindowPrompt(
02071         "HINT",
02072         isGlobalOptions ? 
02073           "The option menu labels are clickable. Click on them for more information!" 
02074           : "Handicap options override multiplayer options!",
02075         "OK",
02076         NULL,
02077         &promptWindow);
02078     }
02079     // player buttons
02080     else if (playerLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02081              || playerRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02082     {
02083       HaltGui();
02084 
02085       if (playerLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02086       {
02087         playerLeftArrowBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02088         player--;
02089         if (player < 0)
02090           player = MAX_PLAYERS - 1;
02091       }
02092       else if (playerRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02093       {
02094         playerRightArrowBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02095         player++;
02096         if (player >= MAX_PLAYERS)
02097           player = 0;
02098       }
02099 
02100       sprintf(playerBuf + 7, "%d", player + 1);
02101       playerTxt.SetText(playerBuf);
02102       handicapTxt.SetText(isHandicapEnabled[player] ? "enabled" : "disabled");
02103 
02104       sprintf(maxLinesBuf, "%d", profiles[player].maxLines);
02105       if (isHandicapEnabled[player])
02106         linesTxt.SetText(profiles[player].maxLines ? maxLinesBuf : "off");
02107       else
02108         linesTxt.SetText("disabled");
02109 
02110       sprintf(attackRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].attackRate);
02111       if (isHandicapEnabled[player])
02112         attackTxt.SetText(profiles[player].attackRate ? attackRateBuf : "off");
02113       else
02114         attackTxt.SetText("disabled");
02115 
02116       sprintf(powerupRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].powerupRate);
02117       if (isHandicapEnabled[player])
02118         powerupRateTxt.SetText(profiles[player].powerupRate ? powerupRateBuf : "off");
02119       else
02120         powerupRateTxt.SetText("disabled");
02121 
02122       //powerupBtn.SetVisible(isHandicapEnabled[player]);
02123       powerupBtn.SetState(!isHandicapEnabled[player] ? STATE_DISABLED : STATE_DEFAULT);
02124 
02125       ResumeGui();
02126     }
02127     // handicap buttons
02128     else if (handicapLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02129              || handicapRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02130     {
02131       HaltGui();
02132 
02133       if (handicapLeftArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02134         handicapLeftArrowBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02135       else if (handicapRightArrowBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02136         handicapRightArrowBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02137 
02138       isHandicapEnabled[player] = !isHandicapEnabled[player];
02139       handicapTxt.SetText(isHandicapEnabled[player] ? "enabled" : "disabled");
02140 
02141       sprintf(maxLinesBuf, "%d", profiles[player].maxLines);
02142       if (isHandicapEnabled[player])
02143         linesTxt.SetText(profiles[player].maxLines ? maxLinesBuf : "off");
02144       else
02145         linesTxt.SetText("disabled");
02146

02148       if (isHandicapEnabled[player])
02149         attackTxt.SetText(profiles[player].attackRate ? attackRateBuf : "off");
02150       else
02151         attackTxt.SetText("disabled");
02152

02154       if (isHandicapEnabled[player])

02160       powerupBtn.SetState(!isHandicapEnabled[player] ? STATE_DISABLED : STATE_DEFAULT);
02161 
02162       ResumeGui();
02163     }
02164     // max lines
02165     else if (linesTxtBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02166     {
02167       linesTxtBtn.ResetState();

02180

02183         "You attack all your opponents every time you score this many points. "
02184         "This raises the speed of the falling block by one level.",
02185         "OK",
02186         NULL,

02188     }
02189     // powerup rate

02191     {
02192       powerupRateTxtBtn.ResetState();
02193 
02194       WindowPrompt(
02195         "POWERUP RATE",
02196         "Every 'x' pieces will be a powerup piece. "
02197         "Clear a powerup piece to earn that powerup.",
02198         "OK",
02199         NULL,
02200         &promptWindow);
02201     }
02202

02205

02207     if (linesDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02208     {
02209       HaltGui();
02210       linesDefaultBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02211       profiles[player].maxLines = DEFAULT_MAX_PLAYLINES;
02212       sprintf(maxLinesBuf, "%d", profiles[player].maxLines);
02213       linesTxt.SetText(maxLinesBuf);

02215     }

02217     {
02218       HaltGui();
02219       linesMinusBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02220 
02221       if (profiles[player].maxLines <= 5)
02222         profiles[player].maxLines = 0;
02223       else
02224         profiles[player].maxLines -= 5;
02225 
02226       if (profiles[player].maxLines <= 0)
02227       {
02228         profiles[player].maxLines = 0;
02229         linesTxt.SetText("off");
02230       }
02231       else
02232       {
02233         sprintf(maxLinesBuf, "%d", profiles[player].maxLines);
02234         linesTxt.SetText(maxLinesBuf);
02235       }
02236       ResumeGui();
02237     }
02238     else if (linesPlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02239     {
02240       HaltGui();
02241       linesPlusBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02242       profiles[player].maxLines += 5;
02243       if (profiles[player].maxLines >= 1000)
02244         profiles[player].maxLines = 995;
02245 
02246       sprintf(maxLinesBuf, "%d", profiles[player].maxLines);
02247       linesTxt.SetText(maxLinesBuf);
02248       ResumeGui();
02249     }
02250     // attack rate
02251     else if (attackDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02252     {
02253       HaltGui();
02254       attackDefaultBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02255       profiles[player].attackRate = DEFAULT_ATTACK_RATE;
02256       sprintf(attackRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].attackRate);
02257       attackTxt.SetText(attackRateBuf);
02258       ResumeGui();
02259     }
02260     else if (attackMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02261     {
02262       HaltGui();
02263       attackMinusBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02264 
02265       if (profiles[player].attackRate > 0)
02266         profiles[player].attackRate--;
02267 
02268       if (profiles[player].attackRate <= 0)
02269       {
02270         profiles[player].attackRate = 0;
02271         attackTxt.SetText("off");
02272       }
02273       else
02274       {
02275         sprintf(attackRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].attackRate);
02276         attackTxt.SetText(attackRateBuf);
02277       }
02278       ResumeGui();
02279     }
02280     else if (attackPlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02281     {
02282       HaltGui();
02283       attackPlusBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02284       profiles[player].attackRate++;
02285       if (profiles[player].attackRate >= 100)
02286         profiles[player].attackRate = 99;
02287 
02288       sprintf(attackRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].attackRate);
02289       attackTxt.SetText(attackRateBuf);
02290       ResumeGui();
02291     }
02292     // powerup rate
02293     else if (powerupRateDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02294     {
02295       HaltGui();
02296       powerupRateDefaultBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02297       profiles[player].powerupRate = DEFAULT_POWERUP_RATE;
02298       sprintf(powerupRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].powerupRate);
02299       powerupRateTxt.SetText(powerupRateBuf);
02300       ResumeGui();
02301     }
02302     else if (powerupRateMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02303     {
02304       HaltGui();
02305       powerupRateMinusBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02306 
02307       if (profiles[player].powerupRate > 0)
02308         profiles[player].powerupRate--;
02309 
02310       if (profiles[player].powerupRate <= 0)
02311       {
02312         profiles[player].powerupRate = 0;
02313         powerupRateTxt.SetText("off");
02314       }
02315       else
02316       {

02318         powerupRateTxt.SetText(powerupRateBuf);
02319       }

02321     }
02322     else if (powerupRatePlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02323     {
02324       HaltGui();
02325       powerupRatePlusBtn.SetState(STATE_SELECTED);
02326       profiles[player].powerupRate++;
02327       if (profiles[player].powerupRate >= 100)
02328         profiles[player].powerupRate = 99;
02329 
02330       sprintf(powerupRateBuf, "%d", profiles[player].powerupRate);
02331       powerupRateTxt.SetText(powerupRateBuf);
02332       ResumeGui();
02333     }
02334     // powerups
02335     else if (powerupBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02336     {
02337       powerupBtn.ResetState();
02338       TCYC_MenuPowerupsPopup(&promptWindow, 
02339                              profiles[player].isPowerupEnabled, 
02340                              profiles[player].powerupStartQueue);

02342

02344     // max lines
02345     if (linesDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED
02346         || linesDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02347         || linesMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED 
02348         || linesMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02349         || linesPlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED
02350         || linesPlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02351     {
02352       linesTxt.SetColor(helpTxtColor);
02353     }
02354     else
02355     {
02356       linesTxt.SetColor(blackColor);
02357     }
02358     // attack rate
02359     if (attackDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED
02360         || attackDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02361         || attackMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED 
02362         || attackMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02363         || attackPlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED
02364         || attackPlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02365     {
02366       attackTxt.SetColor(helpTxtColor);
02367     }
02368     else
02369     {
02370       attackTxt.SetColor(blackColor);
02371     }
02372     // powerup rate
02373     if (powerupRateDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED
02374         || powerupRateDefaultBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02375         || powerupRateMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED 
02376         || powerupRateMinusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED
02377         || powerupRatePlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_SELECTED
02378         || powerupRatePlusBtn.GetState() == STATE_CLICKED)
02379     {
02380       powerupRateTxt.SetColor(helpTxtColor);
02381     }
02382     else
02383     {
02384       powerupRateTxt.SetColor(blackColor);
02385     }
02386     ResumeGui();
02387   }
02388 
02389   promptWindow.SetEffect(EFFECT_SLIDE_TOP | EFFECT_SLIDE_OUT, 50);
02390   while (promptWindow.GetEffect() > 0) usleep(THREAD_SLEEP);
02391   HaltGui();
02392   mainWindow->Remove(&promptWindow);
02393   mainWindow->SetState(STATE_DEFAULT);
02394   ResumeGui();
02395 }
02396 
02397 void _DoEasterEgg()
02398 {
02399   GuiWindow heart(screenwidth, screenheight);
02400   GuiImageData tetrisHeartPink(tetris_heart_pink_png);
02401   GuiImage heartBg(&tetrisHeartPink);
02402 
02403   GuiText thanks("Thank you fans!", 24, (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255});
02404   thanks.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
02405   thanks.SetPosition(-20, -55);
02406 
02407   GuiText sig("-Cale", 24, (GXColor){0, 0, 0, 255});
02408   sig.SetAlignment(ALIGN_RIGHT, ALIGN_BOTTOM);
02409   sig.SetPosition(-20, -25);
02410 
02411   heart.Append(&heartBg);
02412   heart.Append(&thanks);
02413   heart.Append(&sig);
02414 
02415   HaltGui();
02416   mainWindow->DisableChildren();
02417   mainWindow->Append(&heart);
02418   mainWindow->ChangeFocus(&heart);
02419   ResumeGui();
02420 
02421   bgMusic->SetVolume(20);
02422 
02423   bool loop = true;
02424   while (loop)
02425   {
02426     if (!g_heartbeatSound->IsPlaying())
02427       g_heartbeatSound->Play();
02428 
02429     for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PLAYERS; ++i)
02430     {
02431       if (WPAD_ButtonsDown(i))
02432       {
02433         loop = false;
02434         break;
02435       }
02436     }
02437   }
02438 
02439   g_heartbeatSound->Stop();
02440   bgMusic->SetVolume(50);
02441 
02442   HaltGui();
02443   mainWindow->Remove(&heart);
02444   mainWindow->SetState(STATE_DEFAULT);
02445   ResumeGui();
02446 }
